attributes.action: stop all short term plumbing and gas courses. (i.e) 6 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lets put a stop to short term plumbing and gas courses (i.e) 6 weeks to become a qualified plumber and the same again to be qualified gas engineer, when the mojority of us have done 2 or more years at college for just the plumbing quaification, and on site apprenticeships to gain gas qualification.
